sections.general: lead operations engineer - global hawk project profile seasoned aerospace professional with extensive experience in fixed and rotary wing flight testing, test management, systems integration and uav operations. background includes greater than 20 years of experience in flight test planning, execution and reporting and more than 6 years of high- altitude, long-endurance unmanned aerial systems (uas) operations experience and 10 years total uas operations experience.
